title: Isekai Shoukan ni Makikomareta Obaachan - Novel Updates
tags: Cooking   Demon Lord   Demons   Elderly Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Heroes   Magic   Summoned Hero   Transported to Another World
author: Natsumoto Yunosu   夏本ゆのす   香柚
description: I got involved in a different world summoning of high school students, but since I’m unrelated, I shut myself in the forest. I planned to live my remaining years leisurely, but I seem to be able to use magic for some reason, so I think I will try little harder to live.>
